content:
Certainly! Here are some more off-the-beaten-path attractions in Savannah that may be more to your liking:

1. The American Prohibition Museum - This unique museum takes you back in time to the 1920s, when alcohol was illegal in the United States, and offers an interactive experience that includes a speakeasy bar, period costumes, and a mock trial.

2. Escape Savannah - If you enjoy puzzles and challenges, you'll love this escape room experience, which offers a variety of themed rooms to test your skills and wits.

3. The Savannah College of Art and Design Museum - This museum showcases the work of students and alumni from one of the country's top art and design schools, and features a variety of mediums, from painting and sculpture to fashion and architecture.

4. Ghost City Tours - Savannah is known for its haunted history, and Ghost City Tours offers a variety of spooky experiences, including walking tours, trolley tours, and pub crawls.

5. SUP Savannah - If you're looking for an active adventure, consider renting a stand-up paddleboard and exploring the city's waterways from a new perspective.

6. The Savannah Historic District - While not exactly off-the-beaten-path, the Historic District offers plenty of unique and exciting experiences, from horse-drawn carriage rides and ghost tours to rooftop bars and underground speakeasies.

7. The Savannah Food Tour - Dive into the city's culinary scene with a guided walking tour that takes you to some of Savannah's best restaurants, markets, and hidden gems.
